item.description:
We will be using the boxes that we obtained from the Button Box. I will add the dimensions in later for those who have not seen them, but they are slightly larger than a shoe box.
What can we do with these? Shadow boxes, treasure chests, mini theaters, shrines, whatever we can think about.
I think we will work on these over two sessions- session one (this meetup) we will finalize our ideas and do any preparation we need- sanding, gesso, paint, drilling, and start our projects. I will schedule another session later to finish up, or you can take your box home and work on it there.

Time: 2-5 pm

A charge of $5.00 per person is requested to help defray the cost of running the studio.
item.how_to_find_us: Go up the stairs immediately to the right of the front door to the 2nd floor

group.name: The Altered Art and Assemblage Meetup Group

item.name: Transforming Wooden Boxes
